metadata.title: CVE-2024-52531 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: GNOME libsoup before 3.6.1 allows a buffer overflow in applications thatperform conversion to UTF-8 in soup_header_parse_param_list_strict. Inputreceived over the network cannot trigger this.

criterions.comment: libsoup2.4 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
libsoup3 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
